title: A1534 Classic SSD failure
message: Hi, have a question. Is there anything theoretically possible to fix a1534 MacBook 12" Units with failed SSDs. I mean you can fix failed iPhone NANDs by replacing them and reprogramming the new one. Something similar possible here?

title: A1534 Classic SSD failure
message:
You may need to replace NAND and controller.
Its ROM has important info only for recovery purpose. I suppose; may not need to reflash it.

But usually is CPU problem, not from SSD area.
